Leisure facilities include an outdoor swimming pool for adult and children surrounded by sun beds, a well equipped fitness center, lighted tennis court, hair dresser and a full service spa presenting a range of massages and treatments. Address: Final Avenida Intercomunal El Playon El PlayónMacutoEstado Vargas
Description:
Surrounded by mountains and amidst tropical vegetation, Hotel Olé Caribe offers beachfront accommodations overlooking the Caribbean Sea in Macuto. Guests at the hotel can enjoy the outdoor pool, dine in the on site restaurants, and drink freshwater from a mountain spring. Free WiFi access is available.

Each of the spacious and luminous rooms at Olé Caribe Hotel features air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. Some rooms have a seating area, a terrace, and views of the mountains or sea. Bathroom facilities are private, some include a bath tub.

Guests at Hotel Olé Caribe can unwind in the on site bars, relax in the sauna, or workout in the fitness centre. A games room, a tennis court and a sun terrace are also available. Massage therapies can be arranged. Services provided by the hotel include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and airport shuttles. The property offers free parking.

Hotel Olé Caribe is 300 metres from Vargas Water Park and 14 km from Simon Bolívar International Airport. Please inform Hotel Olé Caribe in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Please note reservations must be fully payed before arrival, credit card details are required.
Please note an international credit card is required to make the payment.

Address: Av Casanova, Sabana Grande CARACAS
Attractions: Estadio Universitario: within 1300 metre  Centro Comercial El Recreo: within 600 metre  Universidad Central de Venezuela: within 1800 metre  Jardin Botanico de Caracas: within 2400 metre  Centro Ciudad Comercial Tamanaco: within 2000 metre
Description: This establishment is located at the end of Casanova Avenue, Caracas, just a five-minute walk from Chacaito subway station and close to El Rosal and Las Mercedes. Some of the city's most important venues are situated nearby. This charming hotel welcomes guests in a relaxed atmosphere, exuding traditional hospitality. Warmly decorated, it offers fabulous suites and great rooms to stay in the city, whether for business or family recreation. It has a restaurant with a panoramic view of the hills with a great variety of national and international cuisine for the most discerning palates. This establishment provides 6 conference rooms ideal for conventions and meetings.

Address: Final Av.Principal De Las Mercedes PO Box 467Caracas 1060-A
Description:
Set in Caracas, 5.6 km from Central University of Venezuela, Hotel Tamanaco Caracas offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy French and Mediterranean dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

An à la carte, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Caracas, like hiking.

Botanic Garden is 6 km from Hotel Tamanaco Caracas, while Olimpico Stadium is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Simon Bolívar International, 34 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Hotel Tamanaco Caracas in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Piscina is closed from Thu 27 Apr 2023 until Fri 30 Jun 2023
Guests must show a current and valid ID.

- For Venezuelan clients residing in another country, they must show their passport.
- For Venezuelans residing in Venezuela, the only valid document will be your Current Identity Card.
- For foreign clients, the only valid document is the passport.

Address: AV. BOGOTA LOS CABOS CARACAS
Description: DD Inn Hotel Tibana Caracas is located in a prestigious area of the city, in the crowded business and commercial area of Caracas, offering an easy access to and from important roads of the city. Only a five-minute walk from the Bellas Artes Museum and The National Art Gallery, and less than 10 minutes drive from the Botanical Garden and the Children s Museum of Caracas. The DD Inn Tibana Caracas offers 64 air-conditioned rooms equipped with a private bathroom, satellite TV and minibar. It also offers 24-hour reception, business center, Wi-Fi connection and safe. The hotel has its own restaurant, Da noi Trattoria, with an excellent service, nice attention, good prices and a delicious Italian menu featuring live music every Friday. The hotel also has five meeting rooms, for conferences, meeting and events for up to 150 people.
